project.PortfolioDescriptionP1: Developed with React and TypeScript, using i18n for language switching while leveraging my knowledge.
project.PortfolioDescriptionP2: Also implemented a workflow using GitHub Actions for continuous integration and deployment.
project.PortfolioDescriptionP3: Used HeroUi for the project's user interface.
project.FacemeetDescriptionP1: FaceMeet is a facial recognition web application initially designed for Icosnet to track employee attendance in meetings.
project.FacemeetDescriptionP2: Utilized the latest facial detection models from 2023 (YOLOV7 & YOLOV8), DeepFace for facial recognition, and anti-spoofing for security.
project.FacemeetDescriptionP3: Used AI Themes for the project's user interface.
project.MegaERPDescriptionP1: Developed with React and TypeScript, using i18n for language switching and Ant Design for the user interface.
project.MegaERPDescriptionP2: A management application providing solutions in accounting, finance, business management, payroll, human resources management, and maintenance management.

about.title: From Academic Learning to Real-World Expertise...
about.paragraph1: After five years of study at the École Supérieure d’Informatique, where I gained strong foundations in application design and development, I quickly transitioned into the professional world. For the past two years, I have been working in web development, refining my skills in React, TypeScript, and Ant Design.
about.paragraph2: Every project is an opportunity for me to combine technical precision and creativity, designing intuitive and high-performance interfaces. My approach focuses on creating solutions tailored to users' needs while optimizing experience and usability.
about.paragraph3: Passionate about development and technical challenges, I am constantly seeking learning and improvement. My goal is to create innovative and efficient applications, bringing added value to every project I work on.
